content: I'm wondering if others are encountering this? In restructuring and rebuilding the IPS IG last night and today with Publisher 1.1.72 I found that it is now hanging for a very long time at "Validating Conformance Resources". Adding some further logging it showed that the hangup was on lines like $batch validate for 5039 codes on systems [http://snomed.info/sct]. The batches of ~5000 concepts are taking ~20-30 min. each. And I haven't gotten to the end yet with the largest one, for the full SNOMED CT GPS, which is ~26,000 codes - I'm expecting to see that one is going to take at least 3 hours or so (and I'm in progress with it right now). This wasn't happening until very recently (possibly starting with 1.1.72 - I didn't see it with any earlier versions but I could have skipped one or two). And it's really a completely impractical and intractable issue. It seems that we need either some way to be able speed up this process on tx.fhir.org, or a way to selectively turn it off when needed - or something. @Grahame Grieve?
Well, that's good. It took 3 hours and 24 min to complete, so it would be nice if that doesn't happen again. :)
